sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
  AreaChart,
  Area,
  XAxis,
  CartesianGrid,
  Tooltip,
  ResponsiveContainer,
  YAxis
} from 'recharts'


const LineChart = () => {
    const data = [
  {
    "name": "1Q21",
    "uv": 4000,
    "pv": 2400,
    "amt": 2400
  },
  {
    "name": "2Q21",
    "uv": 3000,
    "pv": 1398,
    "amt": 2210
  },
  {
    "name": "3Q21",
    "uv": 2000,
    "pv": 9800,
    "amt": 2290
  },
  {
    "name": "4Q21",
    "uv": 2780,
    "pv": 3908,
    "amt": 2000
  },
  {
    "name": "1Q22",
    "uv": 1890,
    "pv": 4800,
    "amt": 2181
  },
  {
    "name": "2Q22",
    "uv": 2390,
    "pv": 3800,
    "amt": 2500
  },
  {
    "name": "3Q22",
    "uv": 3490,
    "pv": 4300,
    "amt": 2100
  }
]

  return (

    <ResponsiveContainer>

 
    
    <AreaChart width={730} height={250} data={data}
  margin={{ top: 10, right: 30, left: 0, bottom: 0 }}>
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="colorUv" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1">
      <stop offset="5%" stopColor="#9494A7" stopOpacity={0.8}/>
      <stop offset="95%" stopColor="#9494A7" stopOpacity={0}/>
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="colorPv" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1">
      <stop offset="5%" stopColor="#82ca9d" stopOpacity={0.8}/>
      <stop offset="95%" stopColor="#82ca9d" stopOpacity={0}/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <XAxis dataKey="name" />
  <YAxis />
  <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
  <Tooltip />
  <Area type="monotone" dataKey="uv" stroke="#9494A7" fillOpacity={1} fill="url(#colorUv)" />
  <Area type="monotone" dataKey="pv" stroke="#82ca9d" fillOpacity={1} fill="url(#colorPv)" />
</AreaChart>
   </ResponsiveContainer>
  )
}




export default LineChart
